div.h2: NUBC Point of Origin for Admission or Visit Value Set

div.p: These codes are found in the CMS 1450 form. See HL7 OID information.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

title.value: NUBC Point of Origin for Admission or Visit Value Set

description.value: These codes are found in the [CMS 1450](https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms-Items/CMS1196256) form. See HL7 OID [information](http://www.hl7.org/oid/OID_view.cfm?&Comp_OID=2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.4).
